title: help
body: my lol email address is dead because i don't use it anymore is there away i can change my address on lol? i can confirm my old email address but telling u what it is. please get me in touch with lol support  please

replies.body: its ok  now.  i was using the right email address in the wrong place

No worries bud! Reach out to our accounts team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or Live Chat and they'll be able to help you out with getting back on the Rift. You'll need to verify you're the one who created the account, so do your best answering those questions first.
